description: {"blocks":[{"key":"nluo","text":"Here we introduce the Multi-Nucleic Acid Interaction Mapping in Single Cell (MUSIC) technique for concurrent profiling of multiplex chromatin interactions, gene expression, and RNA-chromatin associations within individual nuclei. MUSIC presents a potent tool for exploring chromatin architecture and transcription at cellular resolution in complex tissues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":22,"length":2},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":64,"length":2},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":71,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3l9l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8bn20","text":"Wash cell culture with ice-cold PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2j4rp","text":"Resuspend nuclei in 250 µL of 5’ phosphorylation master mix followed by an incubation at 37°C while rotating at 800 rpm for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"auakf","text":"Anneal cell barcodes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c0ofs","text":"Aliquot up to 10w of cells for split-pool, and collect the rest of the cells to assess the DNA length after chromatin fragmentation.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ib89","text":"The nuclei solutions from the 96 wells were pooled together into a 15 mL LoBind tube. 95 µL of quenching buffer was added to each well to rinse and collect any remaining nuclei and pooled into the same 15 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e5ggv","text":"Repeat Steps 42-48 for the 2nd and 3rd rounds of split-pool.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"573qv","text":"Incubate the nuclei at 37 ℃ for 10 min at 800 rpm in the PolyA Tailing Buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq9vh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"69i5g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_7":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["316",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["10X E.coli Poly(A) Polymerase Reaction Buffer","1X","25"],["E.coli Poly(A) Polymerase (5 U/uL)","0.08 U/uL","4"],["ATP (10 mM)","1 mM","25"],["RNasin (40 U/uL)","1 U/uL","6.25"],["Water","","189.75"],["Total Volume","","250"]],"guid":"43A12FA6E64846DF9596D43C6CBB8AF9","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"5lf4r","text":"PolyA Tailing Buffer","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["10X E.coli Poly(A) Polymerase Reaction Buffer","1X","25"],["E.coli Poly(A) Polymerase (5 U/uL)","0.08 U/uL","4"],["ATP (10 mM)","1 mM","25"],["RNasin (40 U/uL)","1 U/uL","6.25"],["Water","","189.75"],["Total Volume","","250"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79r1q","text":"Wash the nuclei once with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 1 and three times with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2 at 900 x g for 2 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7mui","text":"Load the RT Mix to the 10X Chromium controller according to Steps 1.1 to 1.5 in the protocol of Chromium Next GEM Single Cell 3’ Reagent kit. Proceed to GEM generation (~18 min). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hris","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jd63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_7":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["137",100],"data":[["Reagent","Volume (uL)"],["RT Reagent B","18.8"],["Reducing Agent B","2"],["RT Enzyme C","8.7"],["Sonicated nuclei","20"],["Water","20.5"],["Total Volume","70"]],"guid":"63000E5946604D24931D25EBDFE77DC5","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3fsbj","text":"RT Mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagent","Volume (uL)"],["RT Reagent B","18.8"],["Reducing Agent B","2"],["RT Enzyme C","8.7"],["Sonicated nuclei","20"],["Water","20.5"],["Total Volume","70"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fo064","text":"Take out all emulsions (~120-150 µl) to a PCR tube. Incubate the GEM in Thermocycler using the following program: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p92","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3g4gk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["208",100],"data":[["Temp. (°C)","Time "],["53","45 min"],["85","5 min"],["Slowly cool down at 0.1°C/s","15 min"],["4","Hold"]],"guid":"54E022F0A167494D821C32FD1F69814A","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":46,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bltc7","text":"Thermocycler Program for Reverse Transcription","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Temp. (°C)","Time "],["53","45 min"],["85","5 min"],["Slowly cool down at 0.1°C/s","15 min"],["4","Hold"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8rhn","text":"Recover nuclei acids form emulsion with 1:1 (~150 µl) of recovery reagent (Go to 10X protocol). Wait for 2 mins. Discard all organic (pink) phase.  Fill the aqueous phase to 200 µL with nuclease free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ent6s","text":"Transfer 30 µl of the pre-PCR Master Mix into each of 8 PCR tubes. Transfer 20 µl of the eluted DNA into each of the 8 PCR tubes. Incubate eluted DNA at 55 ℃ for 15 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftluh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1gum5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_8":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["257",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["10X Isothermal Amplification Buffer II","1X","5"],["Bst 3.0 DNA polymerase (8 U/uL)","0.32 U/uL","2"],["MgSO4 (100 mM)","6 mM","3"],["dNTP Mix (10 mM)","1.4 mM * 4","7"],["RNasin (40 U/uL)","0.5 U/uL","0.625"],["Water","","12.375"],["Total Volume","","30"]],"guid":"9BB2D1743C0B4081A32CA721A8008787","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":18,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"45kdg","text":"pre-PCR Master Mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["10X Isothermal Amplification Buffer II","1X","5"],["Bst 3.0 DNA polymerase (8 U/uL)","0.32 U/uL","2"],["MgSO4 (100 mM)","6 mM","3"],["dNTP Mix (10 mM)","1.4 mM * 4","7"],["RNasin (40 U/uL)","0.5 U/uL","0.625"],["Water","","12.375"],["Total Volume","","30"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8nt8q","text":"Purify with 1.8X (90 µL) of RNAClean XP beads, and elute the sample with 20 µl of water.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ovis","text":"Pool the 8 PCR elution, and load the elution into 5 wells of 4% E-gel. Check the size distribution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for brain tissues
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"gh9t","text":"Incubate samples with 10 mL of 2 mM disuccinimidyl glutarate (DSG) in 1X PBS in a 15 mL LoBind tube at room temperature for 45 min with gentle rotation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4dpg2","text":"Collect cell pellets by centrifugation at 330 x g for 3 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a54vu","text":"Incubate cells with 1 mL of Accutase (EMD, SF006) for 3 min at 37°C to dissociate the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9d7of","text":"Resuspend cells with 10 mL of ice-cold PBS to generate single cell suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"43gll","text":"Incubate cells with 10 mL of 2 mM disuccinimidyl glutarate (DSG) in 1X PBS in a 15 mL LoBind tube at room temperature for 45 min with gentle rotation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"32tvr","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation at 1,000 x g for 4 min, and wash cells once with 1X PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"sb8f","text":"Resuspend cells in 10 mL of 1X PBS containing 3% formaldehyde, and incubate cells for 10 min with a gentle rotation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"df0uo","text":"Wash cells twice with ice-cold 1X PBS containing 0.5% BSA (wt/vol), and centrifuge cells at 1,000 x g for 4 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8nrui","text":"Resuspend cells in ice-cold 1X PBS with 0.5% BSA (wt/vol), and aliquot 5M cells into each 1.5 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fl85a","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation at 1,000 x g for 5 min and snap-freeze cells in liquid nitrogen, and stored at -80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"29sme","text":"Thaw frozen cells on ice, and incubate cells in 1.4 mL of cell lysis buffer A for every 5M cells for 10 min on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap2p8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35kvn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ct25","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_10":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"D_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":["115","114",100,100],"data":[["Component","Working Conc.","Stock Conc.","Volume"],["HEPES, pH 7.4","50 mM","1 M","2.5 mL"],["NaCl","140 mM","5 M","1.4 mL"],["EDTA, pH 8.0","1 mM","0.5 M","100 uL"],["EGTA, pH 8.0","1 mM","0.5 M","100 uL"],["Glycerol ","10%","100%","5 mL"],["Triton X-100","0.25%","100%","625 uL"],["NP-40","0.5%","100%","250 uL"],["Water ","","","10.475 mL"],["Total Volume","","","50 mL"]],"guid":"F7879B34432B467A822A2EB1C843692B","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":19,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"ahk7l","text":"Cell lysis buffer A","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Working Conc.","Stock Conc.","Volume"],["HEPES, pH 7.4","50 mM","1 M","2.5 mL"],["NaCl","140 mM","5 M","1.4 mL"],["EDTA, pH 8.0","1 mM","0.5 M","100 uL"],["EGTA, pH 8.0","1 mM","0.5 M","100 uL"],["Glycerol ","10%","100%","5 mL"],["Triton X-100","0.25%","100%","625 uL"],["NP-40","0.5%","100%","250 uL"],["Water ","","","10.475 mL"],["Total Volume","","","50 mL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3spi6","text":"Collect cell pellets by centrifugation at 900 x g for 4 min at 4°C, and incubate cells in 1.4 mL of cell lysis buffer B on ice for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0s5t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e5b5t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_7":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"D_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":["121","128",100,100],"data":[["Component","Working Conc.","Stock Conc.","Volume"],["Tris-HCl, pH 8","10 mM","1 M","0.5 mL"],["NaCl","200 mM","5 M","2 mL"],["EDTA, pH 8.0","1.5 mM","0.5 M","150 uL"],["EGTA, pH 8.0","1.5 mM","0.5 M","150 uL"],["Water ","","","47.2 mL"],["Total Volume","","","50 mL"]],"guid":"0E2C46347A8C498EBA1777A619050F7D","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":19,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"67hu5","text":"Cell lysis buffer B","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Working Conc.","Stock Conc.","Volume"],["Tris-HCl, pH 8","10 mM","1 M","0.5 mL"],["NaCl","200 mM","5 M","2 mL"],["EDTA, pH 8.0","1.5 mM","0.5 M","150 uL"],["EGTA, pH 8.0","1.5 mM","0.5 M","150 uL"],["Water ","","","47.2 mL"],["Total Volume","","","50 mL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ne2o","text":"Centrifuge isolated nuclei at 900 x g for 5 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for brain tissues
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"igvh","text":"Thaw 50 mg of post-mortem human brain frontal cortex sample on ice in a 1.5ml LoBind tube, and chop the tissue into smaller pieces by pestle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for brain tissues
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4h25o","text":"Wash once with 10 mL of 1XPBS by centrifugation at 1,000 x g for 4 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for brain tissues
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3lpn4","text":"Resuspend the sample in 15 mL of 1X PBS containing 3% formaldehyde, and incubate for 10 min with a gentle rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for brain tissues
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ia7f","text":"Quench the crosslinking reaction by the addition of 5 mL of 1.25 M glycine followed by an incubation of 5 min with a rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for brain tissues
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e3322","text":"Centrifuge the sample at 1,000 x g for 4 min and washed twice with ice-cold 1X PBS containing 0.3% BSA (wt/vol).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for brain tissues
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5tlgb","text":"Chromium Nuclei Isolation kit (10X genomics, 1000494) was used to isolate nuclei from crosslinked cortex samples according to the section for “single cell gene expression \u0026 chromium fixed RNA profiling” (page 25 to page 30 from sample user guide).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for brain tissues
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"81i7j","text":"All the following steps (steps 23-71) are the same for either cell line or human cortex samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eok7u","text":"Add 60 µL of 1X rCutSmart buffer containing 10% Triton X-100 (wt/vol) into the SDS solution above, and incubate the reaction at 37°C for 15 min while shaking at 800 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ksgd","text":"Thoroughly resuspend and permeabilize the nuclei in 200 µL of 1X rCutSmart buffer (NEB, B7204S) containing 0.25% SDS at 62°C for 10 min using Eppendorf Thermomixer C (Eppendorf).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2igea","text":"Wash treated nuclei once with 1X rCutSmart buffer by centrifugation at 900 x g for 2 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6inv2","text":"Resuspend nuclei in 250 µL of 5’ Phosphorylation Master Mix followed by an incubation at 37°C while rotating at 800 rpm for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13m8u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2hca7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_7":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["140",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["10X T4PNK buffer","1X","25"],["T4PNK (10 U/uL)","0.5 U/uL","12.5"],["ATP (10 mM)","1 mM","25"],["RNasin (40 U/uL)","1 U/uL","6.25"],["Water","","181.25"],["Total Volume","","250"]],"guid":"9AFDF82D797F4EA0A4EDD23C4716EF26","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":30,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"esen5","text":"5’ Phosphorylation Master Mix ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["10X T4PNK buffer","1X","25"],["T4PNK (10 U/uL)","0.5 U/uL","12.5"],["ATP (10 mM)","1 mM","25"],["RNasin (40 U/uL)","1 U/uL","6.25"],["Water","","181.25"],["Total Volume","","250"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ecjd4","text":"Wash the nuclei once with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 1 and three times with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2 at 900 x g for 2 min at {"blocks":[{"key":"92bfe","text":"Resuspend the nuclei in 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2 with 0.2 U/µL of RNase Inhibitor, and filter the nuclei through a 10 µM cell strainer (pluriStrainer, 43-10010-50). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3gghs","text":"Wash the nuclei once with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 1 and three times with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2 at 900 x g for 2 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3osbf","text":"Wash the nuclei once with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 1 and three times with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2 at 900 x g for 2 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33mmv","text":"Stain 6 µL of the nuclei suspension with 6 µL of Ethidium homodimer-1, and count the number of nuclei by Countess II Automated Cell Counter (ThermoFisher). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"761oa","text":"Make 100 µl of 45 µM DNA oligo duplex plates, in each well of the PCR plate, the following reaction will occur (total 100 {"blocks":[{"key":"d6n4f","text":"Wash the nuclei once with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 1 and three times with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2 at 900 x g for 2 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f7gjc","text":"Filter nuclei in PBS+0.04% BSA via a 10 µM filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o5ad","text":"Stain 6 µL of the nuclei suspension with 6 µL of Ethidium homodimer-1, and count the number of nuclei by Countess II Automated Cell Counter (ThermoFisher). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57k9i","text":"Transfer 5k cells to a Covaris microtube-15, and filled the nuclei suspension to 15 µL with 1X PBS with 0.04% BSA (wt/vol). Sonicate the nuclei using Covaris M220 Focused-ultrasonicator with water temperature 6ºC, incident power 50 W, duty factor 5 for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cd1uu","text":"Aliquot 25 µl of the recovered nuclei solution into each of 8 LoBind 1.5 mL tubes with 25 µl of 2X reverse crosslinking mix to each of the 8 tubes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d99tj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"nppt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_8":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["174",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["NaCl (5 M)","0.4 M","20"],["SDS (20%)","o.4%","5"],["EDTA (0.5 M)","50 mM","25"],["EGTA (0.5 M)","50 mM","25"],["Proteinase K (0.8 U/uL)","0.04 U/uL","12.5"],["Water","","162.5"],["Total Volume","","250"]],"guid":"CE7612E650AC4788965928B3860E0CD5","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":34,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"27vkh","text":"2X Reverse Crosslinking Master Mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["NaCl (5 M)","0.4 M","20"],["SDS (20%)","o.4%","5"],["EDTA (0.5 M)","50 mM","25"],["EGTA (0.5 M)","50 mM","25"],["Proteinase K (0.8 U/uL)","0.04 U/uL","12.5"],["Water","","162.5"],["Total Volume","","250"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1rjpp","text":"Incubate the tubes at 50 ℃ for 2h at 800 rpm (30s on and 270s off) and 55 ℃ overnight at 800 rpm (30s on and 270s off).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fibm","text":"Conduct PCR for 13 cycles using the Ultra 2 program: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kqf8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0ijc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_6":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["246",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["NEBNext Q5 Mater Mix","1X","25"],["Illumina Universal Adaptor (10 uM)","0.5 uM","2.5"],["Illumina Index Adaptor 1-8 (10 uM)","0.5 uM","2.5"],["Sample","","20"],["Total Volume","","50"]],"guid":"C0FF91368F4C4D07A7D824C68C60E75B","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":14,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"adk46","text":"PCR Master Mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["NEBNext Q5 Mater Mix","1X","25"],["Illumina Universal Adaptor (10 uM)","0.5 uM","2.5"],["Illumina Index Adaptor 1-8 (10 uM)","0.5 uM","2.5"],["Sample","","20"],["Total Volume","","50"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2bipo","text":"Purify the library with 1.2X (60 µL) of AMPure XP beads. Elute with 12.5 µL of water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1lrkd","text":"Purify the nuclei acid in 8 tubes with NEB RNA clean up kit (NEB, T2050S) and elute in 21 µl of water.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"85er3","text":"Check the quantity with Qubit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aadk4","text":"Check the size distribution with Tape station.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cbdsk","text":"Sequence the library. Set the Read 1 of the sequencer to 28 bp, the Index 1 to 8 bp, and the Read 2 to 150 bp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Crosslinking and nuclei isolation for cell lines
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fj52m","text":"Quench the reaction by adding 3 mL of 2.5 M glycine per 10 mL of 3% formaldehyde and incubating cells for 5 min with rotation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6247","text":"Resuspend the nuclei in a Digestion Master Mix followed by an incubation at 37°C for 3 h while rotating at 800 rpm. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1l51h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6odbg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_6":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["144",100,100],"data":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["10X rCutSmart buffer","1X","30"],["HpyCH4V (5 U/uL)","0.5 U/uL","30"],["RNasin (40 U/uL)","1 U/uL","7.5"],["Water","","232.5"],["Total Volume","","300"]],"guid":"56D3135CD63E496883353CA52F1BD59E","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":30,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"e5ums","text":"Chromatin Digestion Master Mix","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Reagent","FInal Conc.","Volume (uL)"],["10X rCutSmart buffer","1X","30"],["HpyCH4V (5 U/uL)","0.5 U/uL","30"],["RNasin (40 U/uL)","1 U/uL","7.5"],["Water","","232.5"],["Total Volume","","300"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"38q8v","text":"Wash the nuclei once with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 1 and three times with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2 at 900 x g for 2 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ut9r","text":"Fill the nuclei suspension to 1144 µL with PBS Wash Buffer 2 and 24 µL of RNAse inhibitor, and pipette 11.2 µL of cell solution into each well of the 96-well plate that contains cell barcodes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3cod","text":"Ligate Barcode Set 1 with the linkers in each well in the Ligation Master Mix at 20ºC overnight with an intermittent mixing at 1600 rpm (30 seconds on and 270 off). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87u7a","text":"Quench the ligation by an incubation for 10 min at 20ºC at 1600 rpm (30s on and 270s off) in 60 µL of quenching buffer for each well of the 96-well plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rs46","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22iuc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fl1g4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"A_7":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"D_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","","",""],"colWidths":["133","133","133","133"],"data":[["Component","Working Conc.","Stock Conc.","Volume"],["PBS, pH 7.5","1X","10X","5 mL"],["EDTA, pH 8.0","50 mM","0.5 M","5 mL"],["EGTA, pH 8.0","50 mM","0.5 M","5 mL"],["Triton X-100","0.1%","100%","50 uL"],["Water ","","","34.95 mL"],["Total Volume","","","50 mL"]],"guid":"309D551AF20448C886CF558D17DEEBB5","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":17,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"85bnf","text":"Quenching buffer ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Component","Working Conc.","Stock Conc.","Volume"],["PBS, pH 7.5","1X","10X","5 mL"],["EDTA, pH 8.0","50 mM","0.5 M","5 mL"],["EGTA, pH 8.0","50 mM","0.5 M","5 mL"],["Triton X-100","0.1%","100%","50 uL"],["Water ","","","34.95 mL"],["Total Volume","","","50 mL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7uv8v","text":"Centrifuge the pooled nuclei at 900 x g for 4 min, and transfer the nuclei into a 1.5 mL tube with 0.5 mL of remaining supernatant. Rinse the 15 mL tube with 500 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2, and collect the residual nuclei into the same 1.5 mL tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dg2ir","text":"Wash the nuclei three times with 900 µL of PBS Wash Buffer 2 by the centrifugation at 900 x g for 2 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4usoa","text":"Excise bands from 300-1200 bp. Extract the DNA with NEB Monarch gel purification kit (NEB, T1020S) using two columns, and elute the DNA with 15 µL of the elution buffer for each column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
